description: Hang every time, when click on menu, make computer unusable, restart is the only option. waste of time, tried on several linux distro. wont work on even good configuration,i5, 8GB RAM. developers should take necessary step to make usable for every one.
The app hangs, every app hangs and even Alt+F2 doesn't work. I had to restart the PC

Just checking the values of the variable hung my system. My system is capable of running good CFD simulations, just for comparison. I believe the developers must have a look at this software and fix the issue. If it crashed, it would be helpful since I could write this review once the window closes. I had to reboot to do this. Albeit, it has a good potential and I wouldnt want the software to be wasted like this.

It has a really good user interface and I find it to be quite useful.
The problem is (and it's a serious problem) that it crashes frequently. I believe this program has a big potential but the developers need to take note.
summary: Great app but needs some serious bug fixing

description: This GUI for Lammps is great
